content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mining and smelting setup at (15.5, 70.5) - UPDATED
- Electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5) producing 42 iron ore per minute
- Wooden chest at (15.5, 72.5) containing 236 iron ore (accumulating)
- Burner inserter at (15.5, 73.5) with output blocked warnings (9 coal fuel)
- Stone furnace at (16.0, 76.0) with no ingredients despite chest contents (20 coal fuel)
- Small electric pole at (13.5, 70.5) providing power
- Current configuration shows persistent alignment issues (1.58 tile gap between inserter drop and furnace)

### Power generation setup at (-9.5, -0.5) - UPDATED
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) operational (99.95 water)
- Boiler at (-5.0, 3.5) with 14 coal remaining (recently refueled)
- Steam engine at (-0.5, 3.5) generating 13500.0 energy
- Pipe network fully functional (water 15°C → steam 165°C)
- Power grid stable at 5,785,600 voltage

## ERROR TIPS

### Critical inserter-furnace misalignment (persistent)
- Inserter drop (15.5,74.5) and furnace input (16.0,76.0) have 1.58 tile gap - must be adjacent
- Output blocked warnings continue (12 total occurrences) - verify clear path and proper alignment

### Furnace operation failures
- No ingredients reaching furnace despite chest contents (14 total occurrences)
- Verify inserter fuel (9 coal) and orientation (currently pointing down)
- Check furnace fuel supply (20 coal present but unused)

### Entity placement verification
- Repeated placement of same misaligned configuration (9 total occurrences)
- Clear ground items before testing (6 successful clearances)
- Verify all connections before production testing (7 missed verifications)

### Power system maintenance
- Boiler fuel monitoring improved (maintained at 14 coal)
- Steam engine operating at full capacity (13500 energy)

### Production diagnostics
- Iron ore accumulation in chest (236 units) indicates complete smelting blockage
- Throughput remains at 42 iron ore/minute with no plates produced

### Configuration protocol
- Measure exact distances between entities before placement (3 successful verifications)
- Test inserter pickup/drop positions independently (not implemented)
- Verify furnace can receive items before full production tests (5 missed checks)

### Entity reference errors
- Missing chest references (2 occurrences) - verify entity persistence after placement
- Always confirm entity existence before interaction (3 failed attempts)
